“ada adhikaranaye swadhinathwaya kelesila .ada minissunta sakayak thiyanawa.apita kiwwe api nadu karayo path karanne na kiyala.dan meyala madakalapuwe nadu karaya path kale.mulu adhikarana kshesthrayama wiruddhayi.nithignyawarun wiruddhayi.ti .en .ee eken mokakda kiyanne as kaloth balagenayi.api karana de bala ganna kiyala kiyanawa.rata palanaya karanne kawuda kiyala hitha ganna ba .ranil kiyanawa eya kiyala.anthimata rajitha kiyanawa un ekekwath neme mamaya kiyala.rajithage putha kiyanawa ohu thama karanne kiyala.

ek mathayak wanne mehi wiwida rupa walin wiwida wu sansiddhin idiripath karana bawayi (uda: sashrikathwaya, yoda nakashasthra dina darshana aadiya pilibadawa saha wiwida dewal gana) esema thawath suwishesha karanawak wanne apage dwipaye gaurawaniyama muthunmiththa lesa sakaleka rawana raju pilibadawa karunu hadara poth liya athi aduruthumekuge adahasa anuwa mema rekha rawana rajuge ho ohuge nadayekuge dadumonara yanayak goda bassima sadaha yoda gena athi guwan pathayaka rekha bawayi.
ahal thiyenen widiyak naha ne me wade karala thiyena ayiya thamayi me liyanne.
me nisama thamanta demapiyangen gutikamata pawa sidu wu bawa da ohu sandahan karanawa.
sigiriya kiyala kiyanne abhirahaswalin aduwak nathi bohoma apuru wishmitha nirmanayak....me kiyanna yana kathawa ehi api wadiya ahapu nathi paththaka gana.
mahanadam puranne jiwithaya kalakirima nisa neweyi.
